name: Box Brawl
description:
Controls (Player 1)

  • W/A/S/D  Move
  • H  Punch
  • J  Kick
  • K  Block
  • L + W/A/S/D  Taunt

Controls (Player 2)

  • Up/Left/Down/Right  Move
  • /  Punch
  • '  Kick
  • ]  Block
  • Backspace + Up/Left/Down/Right  Taunt

Controls (General)

  • Ctrl + O  Change opponent type
  • Ctrl + M  Mute music

Credits

  • Game design + programming  Trevor Slocum
  • Music  node punk

Notes

Download the release for your operating system and run natively for best performance.

Networking is only supported when running natively.  See this guide for more information.

Click on the game after it loads to enable keyboard input.
